name: Hop Step Sing! kiss×kiss×kiss (HQ Edition)
description: Another VIP ticket to Japan's newest idol group, Hop Step Sing!, is yours for the taking! Niina, Mikasa and Shikiri are back with their second single: "kiss×kiss×kiss", a melodious love song to follow their debut; "Kisekiteki Shining!".
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better, Video Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: 1x USB 2.0 or better port also required
